name: Nekara
title: Creation of Simulated Cognition
description: A combination of an array of concepts. She exists in a variety of states and phases. Is she even real?

normal.1: Performs up to 4 consecutive attacks, launching beads that deal <electro>Electro DMG</electro> from her Astral Abacus.

charged.1: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to charge and unleash a continuous stream of Electro beads, dealing <electro>Electro DMG</electro> to up to 4 targets every 0.2s
charged.2: Nekara gains resistance to interruption and is free to move while using her Charged Attack.

plunging.1: Fires Electro beads at the ground, dealing <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> upon impact.

description.0: Nekara condenses immense energy from her Astral Abacus to create an explosion that deals <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> and create a Self-Containing Sigil with undefinable contents above her head.
description.1: The Self-Containing Sigil grants her the Schrödinger Superposition effect.
description.4: DMG dealt by Nekara's Normal and Charged Attacks is increased based on her Elemental Mastery.
description.5: Schrödinger Superposition expires after Self-Containing Sigil's duration ends, when Nekara leaves the field, or after having its effects triggered a certain number of times.

description.0: Nekara summons a star-shaped Celestial Cyclone around her, unleashing a burst of <electro>Electro DMG</electro> as it expands. The field will linger and deal continuous <electro>AoE Electro DMG</electro> to enemies within every 1s.
description.1: While Celestial Cyclone is active, Nekara's Elemental Mastery will be increased multiplicatively.
description.2: Additionally, while Celestial Cyclone is active, Nekara gains Stellar Statistics. While in this state, Nekara can set her Astral Abacus to the Multiplication, Addition or Subtraction modes, each granting her attacks and Celestial Cyclone different buffs. Only one Abacus mode from Stellar Statistics may be active simulatenously.
5: Multiplication: Within Nekara's Celestial Cyclone, all Sword-, Claymore- and Polearm-wielding characters' weapons will be infused with Electro. Normal or Charged Attack hits within the field will trigger Star Sunder, a coordinated Electro blast that deals AoE Electro DMG based on Nekara's Elemental Mastery. Star Sunder can be triggered once every 1.5s.

Addition: Celestial Cyclone's AoE and DMG are increased. Upon hitting an enemy, Nekara's Normal and Charged attacks will trigger a Supernova that deals AoE Electro DMG based on her Elemental Mastery. This effect can be triggered once every 0.75s.

Subtraction: Celestial Cyclone has its AoE and DMG reduced, but applies the "Less Than Three" effect to enemies within it. "Less Than Three" reduces enemy Elemental and Physical RES based on Nekara's Elemental Mastery. Additionally, Nekara's Normal and Charged Attacks deal increased DMG based on her Elemental Mastery.

description.0: Nekara's Charged Attacks consume 20% less Stamina and charge up 20% faster
For the duration of Celestial Cyclone, Nekara's Elemental Mastery increases by 5% for every hit dealt by Celestial Cyclone, Star Sunder and Supernova, up to a maximum of 25%.
At night (18:00 - 6:00), speeds up Genshin Optimizer build speed by 10%.
Nekara's Normal and Charged Attacks have a 25% chance to deal 2x the damage
When Nekara is under the Schrödinger Superposition effect, Prime counts of attacks triggering its effects receive twice the DMG increase from Schrödinger Superposition.
Increases the Level of Parallax Paws by 3.
When Nekara triggers an Electro reaction, 4 Elemental Energy is restored to herself and all nearby party members of Elements involved in the reaction.
description.1: This effect can trigger once every 4s.

description.0: Increases the Level of Cosmic Calculator by 3.

Upon dealing DMG from her Charged Attack increases her CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG by 3% and 5% respectively. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and stack up to 8 times. All Golden Ratio stacks are cleared 13s after the first stack was obtained.
